nodes.text: Rigis Corazon purchased Gryseium Incorporated from founder Huegu Eib. Corazon attempted to use Gryseium Incorporated to corner the food market on Demophon, but failed due to a lack of a contract with the Demophonian government or the Galactic Empire. Sabel Axis Corazon, his daughter, later took control over the company after Corazon was assassinated by agents of a rival company.
